newsitem.title: DUBAI: PRESS DIGEST - United Arab Emirates - Aug 29.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - United Arab Emirates - Aug 29.

text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the United Arab Emirates press on Thursday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- UAE protests Iranian claims in border dispute over Abu Musa island.
- UAE drops F-15, still interested in F-16, French Rafale in $6 billion warplane deal.
- Investors so far subscribe to 850 million dirhams worth of al-Khazna Insurance shares.
- Iranian envoy hands UAE President Sheikh Zaid in Geneva a message from Iran's Rafsanjani.
- UAE Gross Domestic Product (GDP) up 6.6 percent to 144 billion dirhams in 1995.
- Singapore shipyards prepare to battle Dubai, threats loom from China, India.
